title: A possible solution to queen of diamonds Syndra's orbs.
body: What if we kept her orbs purple, but we added a red diamond shape in the middle. It'll still be a purple sphere, so there is no confusing an enemy Syndra's ball for yours, but the skin will have better feeling.

replies.body: I got a solution. Don't make the skin. Maybe Riot should ask what Syndra players want in a skin.

A good Friend of mine wants the skin, I don't play Syndra myself so I really can't add more than that, but I was reading up some other players concerns about the skin and the general consensus is that the skin looks dope minus the bland orbs.
